original_text: After that, Manasseh repaired the outside wall of the City of David. He built it higher, from the west side of Gihon stream, as far as the Fish Gate. Then he continued around Ophel hill. He built the wall up higher than it had been. He also put army officers with their soldiers in all the strong cities of Judah.
korean_text: 그 후에 다윗 성 밖 기혼 서쪽 골짜기 안에 외성을 쌓되 어문 어귀까지 이르러 오벨을 둘러 매우 높이 쌓고 또 유다 모든 견고한 성읍에 군대 지휘관을 두며

sentences.original_text: the outside wall of the City of David.
from the west side of Gihon stream,
as far as the Fish Gate.
Then he continued around Ophel hill.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 오펠 언덕 주위로 이어갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He built the wall up higher
with their soldiers in all the strong cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 군사들과 함께 모든 견고한 성읍들에
